scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,WEB,CHECK -c green,cyan,magenta "npm -w @civictrack/api run dev" "npm -w @civictrack/web run dev" "npm run dev:check"
scripts.dev:check: wait-on http://localhost:4000/health http://localhost:5173 && node -e "console.log('OK Back levantado'); console.log('OK Front levantado')"
scripts.build: npm -w @civictrack/api run build && npm -w @civictrack/web run build
